籤詩版本二:
Ua loaʻa iaʻu kahi waiwai i loko o kaʻu moeʻuhane a ala aʻe au me ka ʻike ʻole, manaʻo wau he ʻōhi wale nō ʻo Nanshan.
Inā nīnau ʻoe e pili ana i ka male a me ka maʻi, mai ʻimi i nā ala e kākoʻo ai kekahi i kekahi.
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ka hōʻailona o ka loaʻa ʻana o kahi waiwai ma ka moeʻuhane.
Makehewa nā mea a pau.
解曰: Aia nā mea i ka wai. ʻAno a me ka lōʻihi o ke aka. Ua paʻa nā mea a pau. ʻAʻole pono e kūkākūkā.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hahai ʻo Ma Chao iā Cao
ʻO Ma Chao (176-222), ka inoa mahalo ʻo Mengqi, he kamaʻāina ʻo ia no Fufeng Maoling (i kēia manawa ma ka hikina hikina o Xingping, ka ʻāina ʻo Shaanxi).
I ka wā o nā Aupuni ʻEkolu, ua pepehi ʻo Cao Cao i ka makuakāne o Ma Chao. Ua hoʻopaʻi ʻo Ma Chao a hoʻouka iā Cao Cao, akā ua pio ʻo Cao Cao a holo.
I ʻike ʻole ʻia e nā koa o Ma Chao, wehe ʻo Cao Cao i kona ʻaʻahu ʻulaʻula, ʻoki pōkole i kona ʻumiʻumi, a holo ma luna o ka lio.
I ka manawa koʻikoʻi, ua hōʻea ʻo Cao Hong me kona mau pūʻali i ka manawa, hoʻōki iā Ma Chao, a hoʻopakele i ke ola o Cao Cao mai ka puka o Gehena.
(He ʻōlelo hoʻohālikelike kēia moʻolelo no ka mea e pakele ai kekahi mai ka pilikia ma ka haʻalele ʻana i kona kaulana a me kona kūlana.)
聖意: Ina aole maikai kou home, e makaala i ka imi dala, ke keakea i na hana, e hoopaakiki i ka mare, e kali ana i ka manawa, pule o Liujia no ka palekana, Ua lohi ka poe hele wawae, ua paa na enuhe kilika, ua paa na holoholona, ​​Ke imi nei na kanaka i kanaka. na hihia, nalo ka pomaikai, nalo ka waiwai, na mai nele, e pule ana i ke Akua, Ua pilikia na mauna a me na luakupapau.
古人: Hahai ʻo Ma Chao iā Cao
